body_text:
Yeah, it's a shame we can't import SimpleTest or anything... oh well.
I think I prefer having this be an argument to withSandboxManager over assigning it. Less stateful that way.
body:
Yeah, it's a shame we can't import SimpleTest or anything... oh well.

I think I prefer having this be an argument to `withSandboxManager` over assigning it. Less stateful that way.
body_html:
Yeah, it's a shame we can't import SimpleTest or anything... oh well.

I think I prefer having this be an argument to withSandboxManager over assigning it. Less stateful that way.
